alert.note: Alert for Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 12:29AM CDT until August 09 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... Eastern Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northeastern Greer County in southwestern Oklahoma... North central Wilbarger County in northern Texas... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1229 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sentinel to 4 miles east of Warren to 7 miles southeast of Elmer, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Altus, Hobart, Granite, Snyder, Tipton, Blair, Mountain View, Olustee, Lone Wolf, Mountain Park, Indiahoma, Roosevelt, Gotebo, Manitou, Elmer, Headrick, Friendship, Cooperton, Altus Air Force Base, and Tom Steed Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
